name: HunterJones_Prototypes
description:
My name is Hunter Jones and this is my 3rd assessment for experimental games. 

Prototype 1: The Changing Seasons

Using the arrow keys to change the scene of the seasons. You can also use the up and down arrow keys to read the story of each seasons.

Prototype 2: Star Collector

Only use the spacebar to move the ship forward, the objective of the game is to collect as many stars as possible. 

Prototype 3: Download Rammer

An endless runner game where you use the arrow keys to move around with the spacebar to jump and double jump. 

Prototype 4: Chaotic Kitchen

This is developed for Samsung S7 and S8. Make as much money as possible before you go in debt.
